complaint.description: Incompetence is an understatement. I queried with customer services an overcharge on my account. It took 3 weeks to get a response and they said they had passed my query to cancellations to cancel a contract that they automatically changed to a month to month contract and doubled the price. I have tried to call to check whether this has been cancelled. I spent 5 minutes on the phone listening to their stupid UNISA adadvert then couldn't transfer to an operator as they said my option selection was invalid. They clearly think everyone has tons of time to waste waiting on a phone talking to a robot.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer service response time and ensure that customers can easily reach a human operator without unnecessary delays.
